title: Makeup against surveillance
description:
Explore how makeup can be used to look awesome and to prevent face detection!
Following Adam Harveys CV Dazzle (https://ahprojects.com/cvdazzle/) we want to find out how to use makeup to not only look awesome, but also prevent face detection!We bring makeup, hair extensions, jewelry, etc and a webcam with a simple face detection algorithm (of course nothing gets recorded).Join us in exploring the limits of face detection! Bring friends, own makeup etc if you want! :)
